channel.title: I Need 24/7 hoster for my 525 server. *Sorry if my topic is in the wrong section
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking for a [b][size=18pt]24/7 hoster,[/size][/b] if you can host for me please reply to this topic or add my msn at mechscapeworlds@hotmail.com
You will also get Owner of my server.
Also, if this is not aloud then I will delete right away, I'm a bit new to these forums.

item.title: I Need 24/7 hoster for my 525 server. *Sorry if my topic is in the wrong section
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You may not request someone to host your server on this site.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need 24/7 hoster for my 525 server. *Sorry if my topic is in the wrong section
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Unfortunately no, this is not allowed, but I can help you.
You can actually host a server on your own computer as long as you have decent internet connection and you portfowarded.
Otherwise you’ll need to purchase a vps. You can get a cheap one off google for like 15$ or less. Thats where donations come in handy
Let me know what you want to do and i can explain it.

Read full topic
